attributes.title: Graham Charles
attributes.imdb: '''Graham Charles''' is a British actor based in Malta.<ref>http://www.timesofmalta.com/articles/view/20110518/life-features/the-maltese-in-game-of-thrones.365998 Times of Malta article about ''Game of Thrones''</ref>In ''Game of Thrones'' he plays the role of Varly, a guardsman of House Stark.==See also==*Template:IMDb
